hero.headline: Two Sports. One Tap. Game On.
hero.subheadline: Badminton & pickleball courts in Ayer Itam. Book online, show up, play.

about.title: Built for Players
about.subtitle: Ayer Itam's home for badminton and pickleball — book online, show up, and play.
about.professionalCourtsDesc: 4 courts with quality vinyl flooring and side-mounted lighting with zero glare.
about.racketStringingDesc: On-site stringing service with 18+ string options. Same-day turnaround available.
about.expertCoachingDesc: BAM-certified coaches for all levels. Private and group sessions available.

sports.title: Two Sports, One Venue
sports.badmintonDesc: Professional courts with quality flooring and lighting. Perfect for casual games or serious training.
sports.pickleballDesc: The fastest-growing sport in the world, now in Ayer Itam. Paddles and balls available for rent.

pricing.noHiddenFees: No hidden fees. Pay only for what you choose.

badminton.title: Badminton Court Rental

dualSport.title: Dual-Sport Venue
dualSport.desc: Badminton and pickleball under one roof. 4 courts ready for both sports — one of the few venues in Ayer Itam offering both.

bookOnline.desc: See real-time court availability and book in seconds. No WhatsApp back-and-forth needed.

facilities.title: Player-First Facilities

terms.pageSubtitle: Please read our terms and conditions carefully before using our facilities.

payment.title: 1. Payment Policy
payment.content: All payments made are strictly non-refundable and non-transferable. Payments cannot be refunded, exchanged, or converted into other sessions, dates, or services under any circumstances.

coaching.title: 2. Coaching & Commercial Use Policy
coaching.content: Court reservations are strictly for personal play only. Reservation for coaching, training sessions, group classes, or any commercial activity without prior written approval from management is strictly prohibited.
coaching.extra: Any booking found to be used for coaching or commercial purposes will be cancelled immediately without refund.

confirmation.title: 3. Booking Confirmation
confirmation.content: Reservation is only confirmed upon receipt of full payment. Customers must send payment proof for verification.
confirmation.extra: Management reserves the right to release the slot if payment proof is not received.

paymentDetails.title: 4. Payment Details
paymentDetails.content: Payment can be made via Touch 'n Go or DuitNow. Please refer to the booking page for QR codes and payment instructions.

outsideSales.title: 5. Outside Sales & Beverages
outsideSales.content: Selling drinks, food, or any products inside the premises without permission is strictly prohibited. Bringing beverages or goods into the facility for resale purposes is not allowed.

cancellation.title: 6. Cancellation & No-Show Policy
cancellation.content: Once booking is confirmed, cancellation, rescheduling, or refunds are not allowed. No-shows will not be compensated.

time.title: 7. Time Strictness Policy
time.content: Booking time starts and ends strictly according to the reserved slot. Overtime usage will be charged accordingly.

damage.title: 8. Damage & Responsibility
damage.content: Any damage to the facility, flooring, nets, or equipment will be charged accordingly. The booking holder is responsible for all participants.

conduct.title: 9. Conduct & Liability
conduct.content: Management is not responsible for injuries, accidents, or loss of personal belongings. All users enter and use the facility at their own risk.

media.title: 10. Media & Recording Policy
media.content: Management reserves the right to record photos and videos for promotional purposes. Written objection must be submitted in advance if any individual does not wish to appear in recordings.

transfer.title: 11. Booking Transfer Policy
transfer.content: Booking transfer is allowed. The booking holder may transfer the session to another individual if unable to attend.
transfer.conditions: However, the booking must not be resold for profit. The price charged must not exceed the original booking rate. The booking holder remains responsible for any misconduct or damages.
transfer.extra: Management reserves the right to cancel bookings suspected of resale at inflated prices without refund.

management.title: 12. Management Rights
management.content: Management reserves the right to refuse service, cancel bookings that violate policies, and update these Terms & Conditions without prior notice.

terms.agreement: By proceeding with payment, you acknowledge and agree to the above Terms & Conditions.
terms.agreeCheckbox: I have read and agree to the
terms.mustAgree: You must agree to the Terms & Conditions to proceed.
